mapper.select:
SELECT count(d.postIdx) FROM postDaily as d JOIN member as m on d.memberIdx = m.memberIdx JOIN post as p on d.postIdx = p.postIdx WHERE p.boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
AND d.postDailyTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND d.postDailyContents LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (d.postDailyTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.postDailyContents LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND m.memberNickname LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into postDaily(postIdx, postDailyTitle, postDailyContents, memberIdx) values(#{postIdx},#{postDailyTitle}, #{postDailyContents},#{memberIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT p.postIdx, p.postDailyTitle, p.memberIdx, p.postDailyRegDate, p.postDailyEditDate, p.postDailyContents, p.postDailyHits, m.memberNickname, m.memberEmail FROM postDaily as p JOIN member as m ON p.memberIdx=m.memberIdx WHERE postIdx=#{postIdx}
